Categorization Methods

1. Automated Rules

Rule-based mapping using vendor names and descriptions

Accuracy: 70-80%

2. Machine Learning

AI-based classification using historical data

Accuracy: 85-90%

3. Manual Review

Expert validation for high-value or complex items

Accuracy: 95-99%

Categorization Rules Engine

# Python categorization example
import pandas as pd
import re

def categorize_spend(row):
    """Apply categorization rules based on vendor and description"""
    
    vendor = str(row['Vendor_Name']).upper()
    description = str(row['Description']).upper()
    amount = row['Amount']
    
    # Level 1: Direct vs Indirect
    if any(term in vendor for term in ['MATERIAL', 'COMPONENT', 'SUPPLIER']):
        level1 = 'DIRECT'
    else:
        level1 = 'INDIRECT'
    
    # Level 2: Category
    if any(term in vendor for term in ['MICROSOFT', 'ORACLE', 'SAP', 'IBM']):
        level2 = 'IT'
    elif any(term in vendor for term in ['DELOITTE', 'PWC', 'EY', 'KPMG']):
        level2 = 'PROFESSIONAL SERVICES'
    elif any(term in vendor for term in ['FEDEX', 'UPS', 'DHL']):
        level2 = 'LOGISTICS'
    else:
        level2 = 'OTHER'
    
    # Level 3: Subcategory
    if level2 == 'IT':
        if 'LICENSE' in description or 'SOFTWARE' in description:
            level3 = 'SOFTWARE'
        elif 'HARDWARE' in description or 'LAPTOP' in description:
            level3 = 'HARDWARE'
        else:
            level3 = 'SERVICES'
    
    return pd.Series([level1, level2, level3])

# Apply categorization
df[['Level1', 'Level2', 'Level3']] = df.apply(categorize_spend, axis=1)

Validation & Quality Control

Categorization Quality Metrics

  • ‚úÖ Coverage: 100% of spend categorized
  • ‚úÖ Accuracy: >95% for top 80% of spend
  • ‚úÖ Consistency: Same vendor ‚Üí Same category
  • ‚úÖ Completeness: All 5 levels for strategic vendors

Common Categorization Errors

‚ùå Miscategorized IT

Telecom often wrongly classified as IT

Fix: Check for phone, mobile, internet keywords

‚ùå Split Vendors

Same vendor in multiple categories

Fix: Standardize at vendor level first

‚ùå Generic Categories

Overuse of 'Other' or 'Miscellaneous'

Fix: Review and create specific categories

80/20 Rule: Focus detailed categorization efforts on the top 20% of vendors that represent 80% of spend. Use automated rules for the long tail.
